Summary: Helicopters ? - Although we could not see the out-line.
divs: sighting detailsin 2008 between may - september 2008, almost every night i would hear a helicopter above caversham\reading. prior to this video i had taken a photo of one of the helicopters & was shocked by what i saw. on the night i recorded this video on my camera phone i heard one & saw only one set of lights. please rotate footage once to the right. the two orange lights are street lamps. i have been unable to edit or cut this footage & i would say only the first half is of relevance. file 2: date taken: 27th may 2008 time: 1.38 am file 2: is of a photo again of one of the helicopters it was taken from inside my living room & it was literally hovering above my garden. my nieghbour was with me & we turned the light off so to observe what this was. as in the video & photo i call them helicopters because they sounded like helicopters sometimes broken helicopters but i\we were unable to see any outline of what i\we could hear, except for in the photo i mentioned first.
trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Reading
